files.name: AutoSaver
files.description: Static class that triggers a given function every X seconds. Can be used to make an autosaver.

files.name: FileTracker
files.description: Class made for Windows OS to track an specific folder in search of new files, renames, deleted files, and any other type of change you may encounter inside the folder

files.name: GitHubSaver
files.description: Class using the GitHub library for C# that holds the connection and credentials. It is not tested enought Be carefull

files.name: GoogleDriveService
files.description: Use of Google's Standar library for C# to retrieve and upload files to a certain Google Drive account. IT HAS NOT BEEN TESTED

files.name: ImageManager
files.description: Exclusively made for WPF, a system that tries to load in cache any Image Source, so that having multiple instances of the same image doesn't eat as much memory as it could

files.name: LocalBackupHandler
files.description: An easy class for creating and retrieven backup files for any kind of proyect you may need

files.name: LocalDataManager
files.description: Static class with functions to convert to Json and retrieve the values given. Also, It includes a function for FlowDocuments in WPF

files.name: Logger
files.description: Standar implementation of a Logger class, that can retrieve and store exceptions that may ocurr on production place, so that you, the developer, can know what the heck just happened

files.name: NetworkUtils
files.description: A series of functions that may be usefull for creating apps that connect's to servers, for example: knowing if the machine has access to internet, or parsing ip values
